data.actual_result: You can see Clyde's profile and you can message them which creates a Group DM with only you in it called "Unnamed"
data.expected_result: You shouldn't even be able to see Clyde's profile, even less message them
data.short_description: You can view Clyde's profile and message them
data.steps_to_repro: - Go on a server and do /nick <whatever> - mention Clyde with ``<@1>`` - click the mention and it will open up Clyde's profile - scroll down and click the "Send Message" button
